00032 #ifndef BDSMADInterface_h
00033 #define BDSMADInterface_h 1

00042 using std::ifstream;
00043 using std::ostream;
00044 using std::list;

00046 typedef list<BDSAcceleratorComponent*>  BDSBeamline;
00047 
00048 #include"BDSAcceleratorComponent.hh"
00049 
00050 //      Class used to construct a MERLIN model from a MAD optics
00051 //      output listing. The file should be generated using the
00052 //      following MAD commands:
00053 //
00054 //      OPTICS, NAME, KEYWORD ,S, L ,K0L , K1L, K2L,&
00055 //                     K3L,TILT,TYPE
00056 
00057 class BDSMADInterface 
00058 {
00059   public:
00060       //        Constructor taking the name of the MAD optics file, and
00061       //        the momentum in GeV/c.
00062       BDSMADInterface (const G4String& madFileName, G4double P0);
00063       ~BDSMADInterface();
00064 
00065      BDSBeamline ConstructModel();
00066 
00067      void SetLogFile(ofstream & os);
00068 
00069   protected:
00070   private:
00071     // Data Members for Class Attributes
00072 
00073   G4double brho;
00074   ifstream ifs;
00075   ifstream synch_file;
00076   G4double synch_factor;
00077   G4double E_Synch;
00078 
00079   ostream* log;
00080 
00081   G4double ReadComponent ();
00082   BDSBeamline* ctor;
00083 };
00084 
00085 inline void BDSMADInterface::SetLogFile(ofstream & os)
00086 {
00087 log=&os;
00088 }
00089 
00090 
00091 #endif
